message: Well said, Jude! We used to watch boxing every Friday and Saturday. It's gone to the wayside now. I'll admit, I cannot name the heavyweight champ now. I knew every division's champ on any given day back then. It's sad. I hope I get to see the fight!

The status quo is not working for our trade/economy. Trade deficit doesn't make us stronger. Manufacturing is regulated to such levels to push them out of the country and leave. Those that are still here import H-1b visa'd workers from 3rd world countries. We are getting screwed on both sides of it.

Shammara Blanchard, to be honest I could give two f*cks about Monsanto in this given situation. Larvicide isn't used in every city for this to be caused by it. What you people that believe this are doing is actually creating a dangerous situation for the public. Women are being asked to wait to start a family to protect the future health of themselves and their unborn based on SCIENTIFIC DATA from more than one source. When this information is constantly distorted and twisted it causes women to let their guard down. They develope the attitude that they can prevent Microcephaly simply by avoiding tap water and changing their diet instead of being truly concerned about Zika.
